Description

This view allows the admin to add a new staff member.
AdminAllStaffView
This view allows the admin to search and view all staff members.

A Widget that displays a table of appointments.
AdminAppointmentView
This view allows the admin to view all appointments.
AdminInventoryView
This view allows the admin to manage the inventory.

The AdminManageDatabaseView class is responsible for providing an interface to manage the database from the admin's perspective.

The class provides an interface for managing hospital staff.

This view allows the admin to manage replenishment requests.

This view allows the admin to update inventory items.

This view allows the admin to update the details of a specific staff member.
AdminUpdateStaffView
This view allows the admin to search for and update staff details.
AdminView
This is the main view for the Admin role.
AppointmentScheduledStatus
The AppointmentScheduledStatus is a Widget to display the status of an appointment that has been scheduled.
AppointmentSlotSelectionTable
The AppointmentSlotSelectionTable is a Widget to display a table of available appointment slots for selection.
AppointmentsTable
The AppointmentsTable is a Widget to display a table of appointments for a patient.
AppointmentUpdateOutcomeTable
AppointmentUpdateOutcomeTable is a Widget that displays the details of an updated appointment outcome for a doctor.

A Widget that displays the details of a doctor's appointment.
DoctorAppointmentRequestsView
DoctorAppointmentRequestsView is a View that allows doctors to manage pending appointment requests.

DoctorAvailabilityView
DoctorAvailabilityView is a View that allows doctors to manage their availability.
DoctorManageAppointmentsView
DoctorManageAppointmentsView is a View that allows doctors to manage their scheduled appointments.
DoctorMedicalRecordsTable
The DoctorMedicalRecordsTable class is a Widget that generates a table of medical records for a doctor.
DoctorPatientCareTable
The DoctorPatientCareTable class is a Widget that generates a table of patients under a doctor's care.
DoctorPatientMedicalRecordView
The DoctorPatientMedicalRecordView class is a view for doctors to view the medical record of a patient.
DoctorPatientsUnderCareView
DoctorPatientsUnderCareView is a View that allows doctors to view the patients under their care.
DoctorRecordAppointmentOutcomeView
DoctorRecordAppointmentOutcomeView is a View that allows doctors to record the outcomes of fulfilled appointments.
DoctorScheduleTable
The DoctorScheduleTable class is a Widget that generates a weekly schedule table for a doctor.
DoctorScheduleView
DoctorScheduleView is a View that allows doctors to view their weekly schedule.
DoctorsSelectionTable
The DoctorsSelectionTable is a Widget to display a table of doctors for selection.
DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView
DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView is a View that allows doctors to update the details of a medical record entry.
DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView
DoctorUpdateOutcomeDetailsView is a View that allows doctors to update the outcomes of fulfilled appointments.
DoctorView
DoctorView is a View that displays an overview of the doctor's information and options.
DoctorViewAppointmentDetailsView
The DoctorViewAppointmentDetailsView class is a view for doctors to view the details of an appointment, including the patient details, appointment details, and the recorded outcome (if any).
DoctorViewPastAppointmentsView
The DoctorViewPastAppointmentsView class provides a user interface for doctors to view and search their past fulfilled or completed appointments.
InventoryItemUpdateTable
A widget that displays detailed information about a specific inventory item in a tabular format.
InventoryTable
The InventoryTable widget displays a table of inventory items.

View for updating the password of a user upon login.
LoginView
View for the login screen.

The PharmacistAppointmentsTable widget displays a table of appointments that have undispensed prescriptions.
